title: Business Analyst Lending
description:
Job Title: Business Analyst – Lending & Risk Domain

Location: Hyderabad, India

Experience: 6 - 11 years




Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled Business Analyst with expertise in the Lending and Risk domain to join our team in Hyderabad. The ideal candidate should have strong experience in Capital Market Products, Credit/Margin Lending, and Wealth Management.




Key Responsibilities:

Gather, analyze, and document business requirements by preparing BRDs, FRDs, Epics, and User Stories.
Conduct requirement clarification and triage calls with stakeholders across diverse geographies.
Utilize SQL to run queries and analyze data independently.
Facilitate discussions with business teams, developers, and testing teams, ensuring smooth project execution.
Create data flow diagrams, process workflows (Visio/Confluence), and presentation decks as required.
Work within Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe) and actively contribute to Agile ceremonies.
Manage tasks and documentation using JIRA, Confluence, SDLC frameworks.
Support business stakeholders with data-driven insights, leveraging strong analytical skills.
Ensure seamless collaboration with cross-functional teams throughout the project lifecycle.




Key Skills & Experience Required:

5+ years of experience as a Business Analyst in Lending, Risk, or Wealth Management domains.
Strong understanding of Capital Market Products, Credit/Margin Lending.
Proven expertise in data visualization and analysis for business reporting.
Excellent communication, documentation, and negotiation skills.
Hands-on experience in SQL for data analysis and report generation.
Proficiency in MS Excel (Advanced), SharePoint, MS Word, and PowerPoint.
Experience using JIRA and Confluence for Agile project management.
Experience in BI tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.) is a plus but not mandatory.
Relevant certifications (Agile, Business Analysis, Project Management, or SQL-related) are preferred.




Preferred Qualifications:

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Finance, Business, IT, or a related field.
Certifications in Agile (CSM, SAFe), Business Analysis (CBAP, CCBA), or SQL are advantageous.
